Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Provides that applicants or recipients for SNAP benefits shall not be subjected to finger imaging as a requirement of the supplemental nutrition assistance program
Summary: Provides that applicants for or recipients of SNAP benefits shall not be subjected to finger imaging as a requirement of the supplemental nutrition assistance program.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to finger imaging for SNAP benefit recipients
